select.id: get認定調査依頼発行一覧

mapper.select:
SELECT dbT5201."iraishoShutsuryokuYMD", dbT5201."ninteichosaKigenYMD", dbT7051."shichosonCode", dbT7051."shichosonMeisho", dbT5101."hihokenshaNo", dbT5101."hihokenshaName", dbT5201."ninteichosaIraiYMD", dbT5910."ninteichosaItakusakiCode", dbT5910."jigyoshaMeisho", dbT5910."daihyoshaName", dbT5910."telNo", dbT5913."ninteiChosainCode", dbT5913."chosainShimei" FROM rgdb."DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho" AS dbT5201 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS dbT5101 ON dbT5201."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5101."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" AS dbT5105 ON dbT5105."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5101."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" AS dbT7051 ON dbT7051."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = dbT5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho" AS dbT5910 ON dbT5910."shichosonCode" = dbT7051."shichosonCode" AND dbT5910."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" = dbT5101."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5913ChosainJoho" AS dbT5913 ON dbT5913."shichosonCode" = dbT7051."shichosonCode" AND dbT5913."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = dbT5101."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" AND dbT5913."ninteiChosainCode" = dbT5101."ninteiChosainCode" WHERE dbT5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = ( SELECT MAX("ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho" WHERE "shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5201."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "logicalDeletedFlag" = false) AND dbT5101."shoriJotaiKubun" IN (#{通常},#{延期}) AND dbT5101."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND dbT5105."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND dbT5105."ninteiShinsakaiWariateKanryoYMD" IS NULL AND dbT5105."ninteiShinsakaiKanryoYMD" IS NULL AND dbT5105."centerSoshinYMD" IS NULL AND
(dbT5201."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" = #{item.ninteichosaItakusakiCode} AND dbT5201."ninteiChosainCode" = #{item.ninteiChosainCode} AND dbT5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = #{item.shoKisaiHokenshaNo} )
AND dbT5201."ninteichosaIraiYMD" >= #{iraiFromYMD}
AND dbT5201."ninteichosaIraiYMD" <= #{iraiToYMD}
AND dbT5201."iraishoShutsuryokuYMD" IS NULL
AND dbT5201."iraishoShutsuryokuYMD" IS NOT NULL
AND dbT5201."chosahyoTouShutsuryokuYMD" IS NULL
AND dbT5201."chosahyoTouShutsuryokuYMD" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY dbT5201."iraishoShutsuryokuYMD", dbT5201."ninteichosaKigenYMD", dbT7051."shichosonCode", dbT5101."hihokenshaNo", dbT5201."ninteichosaIraiYMD", dbT5910."ninteichosaItakusakiCode", dbT5913."ninteiChosainCode"
